# Topic 4: Sequels and Reboots
```{r}
df <- db %>%
  dbGetQuery("SELECT t.id, t.title, ml.linked_movie_id, t2.title, t.production_year, ml.link_type_id
              FROM imdb.title AS t
              JOIN imdb.movie_link AS ml ON ml.movie_id = t.id
              JOIN imdb.title AS t2 ON t2.id = ml.linked_movie_id
              WHERE t.kind_id = 1
                AND ml.link_type_id = 1 OR ml.link_type_id = 3;")
```
